MSG_ADDON_ALREADY_DOWNLOADED: Addon already downloaded, using saved version located at: %s
MSG_ADDON_DELETE_OLD_VERSION: Deleting content of the previous version of this addon in %s

ERR_INVALID_INSTALL_DIR: Please move the installer into the MO2 directory

ERR_MISSING_MODLIST_CFG: Unable to locate the modlist configuration file
ERR_MODLIST_CFG_PARSE_ERROR: The modlist configuration file seems to be malformed
